resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/49510</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>49510</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_397</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_397</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Tipos de funciones. Operaciones con funciones</string>
            <string language="en">Types of functions. Operations with functions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Typen von Funktionen. Operationen mit 
Funktionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Types de fonctions. Exécutions avec des 
fonctions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tipos de funções. Operações com as 
funções</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tipi di funzioni. Funzionamenti con le 
funzioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τύποι λειτουργιών. Διαδικασίες με τις 
λειτουργίες</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de familia de funciones. Se comienza con un haz de rectas que pasan por un punto y se generaliza a otras familias de funciones dependientes de un parámetro real.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study the concept of family of functions. It introduces the subject with a set of lines that intersect at a given point and then studies a generalisation with other functions that depend on a real-valued parameter.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">parámetro</string>
            <string language="en">parameter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">haz de rectas</string>
            <string language="en">one-parameter family of lines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">familia de funciones</string>
            <string language="en">family of functions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der Familie von Funktionen zu studieren. 
Sie stellt das Thema mit einem Set Zeilen, die an einem 
gegebenen Punkt schneiden vor und studiert dann eine Verallgemeinerung
mit anderen Funktionen, die von einem Realwertparameter abhängen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier le concept de la famille des fonctions. 
Elle présente le sujet avec un ensemble de lignes qui 
intersectent à un point donné et puis étudie une généralisation 
avec d'autres fonctions qui dépendent d'un paramètre à valeurs 
réelles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar o
conceito da família das funções. Introduz o assunto com um 
jogo das linhas que se cruzam em um ponto dado e estuda então uma 
generalização com outras funções que dependem de um parâmetro 
real-valued.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare il concetto della famiglia delle funzioni. Introduce 
l'oggetto con un insieme delle righe che intersecano ad un dato punto 
ed allora studia una generalizzazione con altre funzioni che dipendono
da un parametro real-valued.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να μελετήσει την έννοια της οικογένειας των λειτουργιών. 
Εισάγει το θέμα με ένα σύνολο γραμμών που κόβουν σε ένα 
δεδομένο σημείο και μελετά έπειτα μια γενίκευση με άλλες 
λειτουργίες που εξαρτώνται από μια real-valued παράμετρο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Parameter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einparameter Familie der Zeilen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Familie von Funktionen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">paramètre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">famille d'un-paramètre des lignes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fonction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">famille des fonctions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">parâmetro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">família do um-parâmetro das linhas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">função</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">família das funções</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">parametro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">famiglia di un-parametro delle righe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">funzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">famiglia delle funzioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παράμετρος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οικογένεια ένας-παραμέτρου των γραμμών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λειτουργία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οικογένεια των λειτουργιών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
